author: Chaim Gartenberg
title: Niantic’s AR Harry Potter game has a cute solution to COVID-19 self-quarantines
description: Niantic’s augmented reality Harry Potter: Wizards Unite game is getting a new Knight Bus feature to let players enjoy Fortress content while maintaining stay-at-home orders.
content:
